column4: Hi all. I made put a VFAT partition and a LUKS partition on a USB drive today. However, I am unable to access the VFAT partition from Windows. Would this be because I made it the second partition? I'm pretty sure I did this on my last USB drive without any problem. Any ideas?
I used fdisk to create it.
- windows will need the fat32 partition on a usb stick to be the 1st one
